log.description: Computing attributes for an object of type 'story': output of the associated XSL transformation
log.error: Error importing an object from the XML generated by the XSL transformation associated with the object type 'story': 'Unable to connect to the database. Wrong connection parameters or server down. The connection parameters are specified in the Web.config file in the 'appSettings' section. Cannot open database "GN4Test" requested by the login. The login failed. (ERR0202)' (ERR0252)
